source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_00<tab>Lucia is not one to rest on her laurels.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_00<tab>Lucia fragt sich, wer hinter dem Attentat auf Großmeister Aymeric und den Brandstiftungen stehen könnte.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_01<tab>As you and the others debate how best to proceed, Ser Aymeric enters the room in the company of lords Edmont and Artoirel to the delight and relief of all present. Alas, the resulting mood of optimism is soon soured by the arrival of a panicked knight bearing grave tidings: a rebel faction calling themselves the True Brothers of the Faith have seized control of the Vault, and taken the refugees sheltering within hostage. Needless to say, the lord commander cannot bow to the demands of such zealots, leaving him with but one option: an armed assault. Without hesitation, you and your fellow Scions volunteer to help, prompting Lord Artoirel to pledge his support as well.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_01<tab>Während du dich mit Aymeric und Lucia besprichst, erhaltet ihr Nachricht, dass eine bewaffnete Gruppe namens „Die Brüder des Wahren Glaubens“ in die Basilika eingedrungen ist und die Leute, die durch die Brandstiftungen ihre Häuser verloren und in der Basilika Unterschlupf gesucht haben, als Geiseln genommen haben. Aymeric ist entschlossen, die Geiseln zu retten. Triff ihn im Strebewerk.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_02<tab>Though you succeed in sneaking into the basilica undetected, the rebels soon catch wind of your presence, and attempt to execute the hostages. Fortunately, they are no match for you and your allies, and together you are able to rescue all but one of their captives─a young girl named Maelie, whom you learn was borne off to the upper levels by a priest. You, Ser Aymeric, and Lord Artoirel have no choice but to give chase.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_02<tab>Ihr habt die Geiseln aus den Händen der Papstloyalisten gerettet. Kehre zum Strebewerk zurück.

source:
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_03You finally corner the priest on the uppermost level of the Vault, and Ser Aymeric demands his immediate surrender. Alas, the man will not hear reason, being convinced beyond all doubt that Ser Aymeric is a traitor to both kin and country. In a final act of defiance, he throws Maelie from the ledge, sending the child tumbling towards the plaza.

Far below, Lucia and Y'shtola can only watch in horror as the screaming figure plummets towards them. But just when all hope seems lost, a great white dragon swoops down to pluck her from the very jaws of death. Vidofnir!

Soon after, you, Ser Aymeric, and Lord Artoirel join the others outside, where Vidofnir is waiting to deliver a warning from Hraesvelgr. It would seem Nidhogg and his brood have flown for skies unknown. When Alphinaud subsequently presses the dragon for answers regarding Estinien, she declares that she can provide none, and bids you farewell. Though her visit was all too brief, Ser Aymeric hopes that it will do much to change the opinions of the common man. Yet Lord Edmont, who does not share in his optimism, implores the young knight to move with greater caution, lest more perish in his headlong rush for change─not least Ser Aymeric himself, whom the count plainly cherishes as a son.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_03<tab>Ihr verfolgt die Geiselnehmer und stellt deren Anführer, einen papsttreuen Priester. In die Enge getrieben, stößt der wahnsinnige Kleriker die kleine Maelie von einem Turm der Basilika in die Tiefe. Just in diesem Moment gleitet Vidofnir herab, fängt das todgeweihte Mädchen auf und setzt sie sicher auf der Großen Aspis ab. Die anwesenden Bürger sind von diesem Freund<var 16 /var>schaftsbeweis eines Drachen begeistert. Vidofnir berichtet dir davon, dass Nidhogg aufgebrochen ist. Sprich mit Alphinaud über die Vorkommnisse.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_04<tab>In the wake of Vidofnir's departure, Y'shtola speaks to you privately regarding Thancred, in whom she senses a troubling change. According to her, his aetheric flow has been disrupted in a manner which would theoretically prevent him from wielding all magicks, teleportation included. Though she stresses that this is as yet mere speculation, it would do much to explain why he did not risk seeking out the Scions upon learning that a primal had been summoned. In the absence of proof, however, you have no choice but to remain silent and attend Alphinaud in Fortemps Manor.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_04<tab>Alphinaud und Thancred sind ins Anwesen der Fortemps zurückgekehrt, um Tataru von den Geschehnissen in Kenntnis zu setzen. Bevor du ihnen folgst, bemerkt Y'shtola dir gegenüber, dass sich Thancred seit dem antiken Teleportzauber verändert habe und nicht länger in der Lage sei, Magie zu wirken. Sprich mit Alphinaud im Anwesen der Fortemps.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_05<tab>As you discuss recent events with Alphinaud and Tataru, lords Artoirel and Emmanellain enter, having come to present you all a token of their gratitude: a House Fortemps shield fit for a true knight. It soon becomes clear, however, that this was not Artoirel's only reason for seeking an audience when he reveals that Count Edmont means to step aside, leaving him to take his father's place as the head of House Fortemps. In this way, Count Edmont intends to rid the house of the lingering suspicion that it was complicit in a coup d'état orchestrated by Ser Aymeric. Yet while Lord Artoirel had long dreamed of this day, it would seem that the recent revelations regarding the founding fathers of Ishgard had prompted him to question the value of his birthright─until, that is, he recalled his late brother's words: “A knight lives to serve─to aid those in need.” And so he vows to follow Haurchefant's proud example and labor for the greater good of Ishgard. And should his resolve waver, he hopes that you will show him the way─as a <var 08 E905 ((sister)) ((brother)) /var>.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_05<tab>Um euch für eure Dienste zu danken, überreicht Artoirel euch ein Geschenk: einen Wappenschild seines Hauses. Er und sein Bruder Emmanellain sind entschlossen, weiterhin den Bürgern der Stadt zu dienen und sie zu beschützen. Ishgard hat noch nicht zur Ruhe gefunden, aber alte wie neue Helden kämpfen für ihr Wohl.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_00<tab>Rendezvous with Aymeric in the Pillars.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_00<tab>Im Strebewerk mit Aymeric sprechen

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Aymeric.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_01<tab>Im Strebewerk mit Aymeric sprechen

target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_02<tab>Auf der Großen Aspis mit Alphinaud sprechen

target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_03<tab>Im Fortemps-Anwesen mit Alphinaud sprechen

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>How desperately we cling to that which we hold dear, knowing all the while that a day will come when we must let go.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>Wenn man jemanden verliert, der einem nahe steht, kann das einen verändern ... Zum Guten, oder auch zum Schlechten.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_005<tab>It was not so long ago, was it...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_005<tab>Haurchefant wird schmerzlich vermisst ... Von uns allen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HILDA_000_010<tab>The past belongs to the dead. The future's ours to do with what we will.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HILDA_000_010<tab>Ich tu, was ich kann, um zu helfen. Viel Zeit, einem aufrichtigen Ritter nachzutrauern, bleibt mir dabei aber nicht.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_015<tab>No more farewells. Not for a good while yet, at least.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_015<tab>Wir haben viele Freunde verloren ... Ich muss alles tun, um dem Bund wieder zu alter Stärke zu verhelfen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_020<tab>Concentrate on freeing the hostages. I will tend to their wounds.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_020<tab>Konzentrier dich auf die Befreiung der Geiseln. Ich kümmere mich um die Obdachlosen und die Verletzten.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_025<tab>Ready when you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_025<tab>Es wird Zeit, einen Schlussstrich zu ziehen und diesem Aufstand ein Ende zu bereiten.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HILDA_000_030<tab>Bastards! If I had it my way, I'd be leadin' the charge myself!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HILDA_000_030<tab>Verdammt! Damit so etwas nicht passiert, habe ich doch diese Miliz gegründet!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SYMME_000_035<tab>Give 'em what for, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SYMME_000_035<tab>Ich kümmere mich um die Schwaden.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_EUDESTAND_000_040<tab>Don't you dare let us down! Bring our people home safe!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_EUDESTAND_000_040<tab>Die Geiseln! Rettet die Geiseln!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_LUCIA_000_045<tab>We will hold here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The Fury guide and keep you!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_LUCIA_000_045<tab>Die Basilika ist umstellt. Hier kommt keiner mehr raus.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_050<tab>Just like old times, eh?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_050<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, denk daran, dass die Geiseln oberste Priorität haben.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_000_055<tab>Do not concern yourself with my safety. Lest you forget, I too am a knight.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_000_055<tab>Vertrau meinem Schwertarm. Ich habe fleißig geübt.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HANDELOUP_000_057<tab>Pray keep in mind that the lord commander has not fully recovered from his wounds. Though the safety of the hostages is of paramount concern, I would ask that you do your utmost to dissuade him from engaging in any...heroics.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HANDELOUP_000_057<tab>Ich habe alle Einheiten informiert. Die Befreiungsaktion kann starten.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_060<tab>Listen well. We will enter the basilica silently via this gate. According to our latest reports, there are at least six hostages being held within. The numbers and readiness of the True Brothers of the Faith are unknown.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_060<tab>Wir dringen durch den Hintereingang in die Basilika ein. Wenn die Informationen der Späher korrekt sind, warten sieben Geiseln auf unsere Rettung. Wer die „Brüder des Wahren Glaubens“ sind, wissen wir aber nicht.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_000_061<tab>I am told one claimed to have served under Thordan VII. Might the same be true of the rest?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_000_061<tab>Bei dem Namen kann man nur mutmaßen, dass sie sich der Kurie verbunden fühlen. Anhänger vom verblichenen Thordan etwa?

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_062<tab>Given the swiftness with which they seized control of the Vault, I think it highly likely, yes─which means that they may well possess the knowledge required to turn the building's defenses against us.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_062<tab>Ein naheliegender Gedanke, da sie mir nach dem Leben trachten. Sie wollen die alte Ordnung wieder einführen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_063<tab>Be that as it may, we have no choice but to press on. Lord Artoirel─you are a brave man and true, and none would dare question your honor if you chose not to risk your life in this endeavor. Are you certain you wish to join us?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_063<tab>Wie auch immer - was jetzt zählt, ist die Sicherheit der Geiseln. Seid ihr bereit? Artoirel?

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_000_064<tab>I am no stranger to the battlefield, Ser Aymeric! My arm will not falter; my shield will not break! Halone as my witness, we will bring these fanatics to justice!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_000_064<tab>Ich bin bereit, mein Schwert und mein Schild in den Dienst der Bürger dieser Stadt zu stellen! So wahr ich ein Fortemps bin!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_065<tab>Well said, my lord! Friends─follow me!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_065<tab>Euer Kampfgeist soll uns zum Vorbild gereichen. Also los!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_066<tab>Ser Simeonard! Lay down your arms and release the hostages, and you will be shown mercy! I give you my word!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_066<tab>Hier endet euer Unterfangen. Senkt die Waffen und lasst die Geiseln frei.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_000_067<tab>(-Simeonard of the Holiest Flame-)Hah! The word of a heretic and kinslayer! I would sooner trust a dragon. Activate the knights! We shall show the hostages the same mercy he showed the archbishop!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_000_067<tab>(-Simeonard von der Heiligsten Flamme-)Geiseln? Du bist es doch, der die gesamte Stadt als Geisel hält! Usurpator!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_000_068<tab>(-Simeonard of the Holiest Flame-)Unlike you, Ser Aymeric, I am a man of honor. By my hand, you shall receive of the Fury's judgment!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_000_068<tab>(-Simeonard von der Heiligsten Flamme-)Aymeric! Wir haben deinen Staatsstreich durchschaut! Du hast die Stadt mit Gewalt genommen, und gewaltsam werden wir sie dir wieder entreißen!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_069<tab>So it is to be a trial, then. Lord Artoirel, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─leave us and save the hostages! I will deal with Ser Simeonard!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_069Seid ihr des Wahnsinns? Was redet ihr da?
)) (( )) 02 /var>, Artoirel. Rettet die Geiseln unten. Ich kümmere mich um diese Verrückten hier.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_070<tab>Well that was timely. Vidofnir must have been circling for hours.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_070<tab>Der weiße Drache hat seinen Auftritt gut abgepasst. Ob das ein Zufall war?

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_075<tab>In the moments before Vidofnir appeared, I contemplated teleporting the girl. Thank the Twelve that I did not.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_075<tab>Das arme Mädchen! Für einen Moment dachte ich, es sei um sie geschehen ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_LUCIA_000_076<tab>Since Haurchefant's death, Lord Edmont has grown ever more cautious. To speak plain, the man is afraid to hope. But I am not. Vidofnir's act of heroism <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> serve to shift public opinion in our favor, of that I have no doubt.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_LUCIA_000_076<tab>Ich verstehe die Sorgen des Grafen, aber dass ein Drache ein Ishgarder Kind rettet ... Das hat bei den Leuten Eindruck hinterlassen, keine Frage.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HILDA_000_077<tab>After this, I reckon there'll be a few less folk cursin' dragons 'round here, and a few more cursin' the clergy─which is fine by me.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HILDA_000_077<tab>Wir haben die Geiseln befreit. Doch die Kluft zwischen den Bewohnern der Schwaden und der Kurie hat sich weiter vergrößert, das war zu spüren.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SYMME_000_078<tab>Well, I'll be damned! Not only is Maelie safe, but she got to ride a dragon!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SYMME_000_078<tab>Maelie ist wohlauf, Halone sei Dank!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_EUDESTAND_000_079<tab>We're the only family Maelie's got─her and a lot of other children. All the more reason to strengthen the watch, I say.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_EUDESTAND_000_079<tab>In den Schwaden gibt es viele Kinder wie Maelie, Waisen ohne feste Bleibe. Auch die Miliz kann ihnen nur begrenzt helfen. Was sie brauchen, ist ein richtiges Zuhause.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HANDELOUP_100_079<tab>Words cannot well express our gratitude, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Thank you for rescuing the hostages...and for keeping the lord commander safe.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HANDELOUP_100_079<tab>Dass der Bund der Morgenröte die Geiseln befreit hat, werden wir ihm nicht vergessen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_080<tab>This has been a day of surprises, has it not? 'Tis but a pity Vidofnir could not stay longer.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_080<tab>Das wäre beinahe schiefgegangen ... Wir können von Glück sagen, dass Vidofnir aufgetaucht ist.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_081<tab>Yes, I think it's fair to say that she timed her departure rather less well than her arrival.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_081<tab>Es stand auf Messers Schneide, aber der Weiße Drache hat den Tag gerettet.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_082<tab>Well-timed scarcely does it justice. But one moment later would have been a moment too late.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_082<tab>Ja, Drachen haben ein Händchen für dramatische Auftritte. Es ist, wie Aymeric gesagt hat: Die Leute waren von Vidofnirs Geste der Freund<var 16 /var>schaft beeindruckt.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_083<tab>Let us pray that the Ishgardians who yet harbored doubts will take these events to heart and accept the truth of Ser Aymeric's words.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_083<tab>Sie haben ein wenig ihre Angst vor den Drachen verloren. Hoffen wir, dass diese Tat nicht so schnell in Vergessenheit gerät.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_084<tab>Well, 'tis only meet that I inform Tataru of what has occurred here. If you have need of me, I shall be at Fortemps Manor.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_084<tab>Kehren wir ins Anwesen der Fortemps zurück. Tataru sollte alles aus erster Hand erfahren.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_085<tab>Allow me to accompany you. Tataru would never forgive me if I left for the Rising Stones without saying good-bye.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_085<tab>Gut. Und sobald wir ihr alles erzählt haben, kehre ich in den Sonnenstein zurück. Ich war schließlich schon eine Ewigkeit nicht mehr da.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_086<tab>A moment, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I wish a word.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_086<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_100_086<tab>Tell me, does Thancred seem quite well to you?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_100_086<tab>Sag mal, wie denkst du eigentlich über den neuen Thancred?

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_Q1_000_000<tab>Wie denkst du über Thancred?

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_A1_000_000<tab>He held his own in the Vault.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_A1_000_000<tab>Ein schnittiger Kerl, wie eh und je.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_A1_000_001<tab>He got on well enough with Hilda.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_A1_000_001<tab>Ein Weiberheld, genau wie früher.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_A1_000_002<tab>I'm not sure how to put it into words, but...

TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_087<tab>That he did─which is especially remarkable given the injury to his eye. I can only assume that his time in the wilderness afforded him ample opportunity to compensate for his impairment.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_087<tab>Schnittig wie eh und je, das ist er. Aber ich sehe auch etwas Neues in ihm ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_088<tab>However, I speak not of his physical state, but rather his aetheric flow, which I fear has been irreparably disrupted.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_088<tab>Findest du nicht, dass er sich verändert hat? Ich spüre es ganz deutlich ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_089<tab>Of that I have no doubt. His time in the wilderness did not deprive him of his charm.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_089<tab>Ja, das war er ja schon immer. Lass dir gesagt sein, hinter der Aufreißermasche steckt ein weicher Kern, hihi.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_090<tab>But that is neither here nor there. What concerns me is his aetheric flow, which I fear has been irreparably disrupted.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_090<tab>Aber ich meinte etwas anderes ... Findest du nicht, dass er sich verändert hat? Ich spüre es ganz deutlich ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_091<tab>So you sense it too. A subtle change, imperceptible to most.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_091<tab>Du bist dir nicht sicher? Dann spürst du es vielleicht auch?

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_092<tab>I myself did not notice it at first, but upon closer examination, I saw that his aetheric flow had been irreparably disrupted.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_092<tab>Er hat sich verändert. Ich jedenfalls spüre es ganz deutlich ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_093<tab>As a result, I strongly suspect that his ability to manipulate aether has been compromised. Simply put, Thancred may no longer be able to wield magicks.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_093<tab>Seit er den Ätherstrom verlassen hat ... ist er nicht mehr der Alte. Er hat ... Er kann ... Also kurzum gesagt ... Er kann keine Magie mehr wirken.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_094<tab>It would do much to explain why he chose to remain within the wilderness instead of seeking us out. He would have been compelled to rely solely on traditional methods of travel, significantly prolonging his journey. And when he learned that a nearby beast tribe was making preparations to summon a primal, it may well have seemed more sensible to wait.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_094<tab>Das ist der Grund, warum er sich nicht einfach wegteleportieren konnte und durch den Wald irrte. Schuld ist mein antiker Teleportzauber, fürchte ich ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_095<tab>But this is still little more than speculation. Until I have proof, pray speak no word of it.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_095<tab>Ich habe eine Bitte an dich. Pass ein bisschen auf Thancred auf. Es ist so schwer, seine wahren Gedanken zu erraten ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_096<tab>Right, then. I should be on my way. Krile may have charmed Master Matoya for now, but who can say how long it will last.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_096Ich danke dir. Ich weiß, dass ich mich auf dich verlassen kann.
Gut, ich kehre nun nach Frohehalde zurück, um nach Matoya und Krile zu sehen. Bis bald!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_100<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_100<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TATARU_000_105<tab>Lord Edmont told me all about what Vidofnir did! Gods, how I wish I had been there to see it.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TATARU_000_105<tab>Der Graf hat mir schon berichtet, was vorgefallen ist. Unglaublich! Maelies Rettung klingt wie die Szene aus einem Bardenlied!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_BUTLER01580_000_106<tab>When I heard the commotion, I went outside to look, but all I saw was the dragon's silhouette on the horizon...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_BUTLER01580_000_106<tab>Als ich hörte, dass ein Drache unsere Stadt in friedlicher Absicht besucht, bin ich mit den anderen Bediensteten sofort auf die Straße gestürzt. Wir haben ihn soeben noch wegfliegen sehen, mit seinen weiten, strahlenden Schwingen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_STEWARD_000_107<tab>It is a relief to see that you are unharmed, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Pray remain here a moment─Lord Artoirel should be returning shortly.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_STEWARD_000_107<tab>Ich bin erleichtert, dass Herr Artoirel wohlbehalten zurückgekehrt ist. Wahrscheinlich habe ich Euch dafür zu danken.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_QIB_TODO_001<tab>Rescue the hostages!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_QIB_TODO_001<tab>Befreie die Geiseln!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_QIB_TODO_AYMERIC_HP_GAUGE_NAME<tab>Aymeric's Vitality
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_QIB_TODO_AYMERIC_HP_GAUGE_NAME<tab>Aymerics Gesundheit

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_QIB_TODO_HOSTILE_NUMBER<tab>Hostages Rescued
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_QIB_TODO_HOSTILE_NUMBER<tab>Geiseln befreit

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_QIB_TODO_ATTACKED_HOSTILE_NUMBER<tab>Bonds Untied
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_QIB_TODO_ATTACKED_HOSTILE_NUMBER<tab>Attackierte Geiseln befreit

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_001_001<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_001_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_001_002<tab>'Twould seem our presence yet goes unnoticed. Come─we must secure the entrance.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_001_002<tab>Sichert den Eingang! Achtet darauf, keine Geiseln zu verletzen!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_001_003<tab>Remember: saving the hostages takes precedence over all else. Mind your attacks, and subdue the enemy quickly.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_001_003<tab>Beschützt die Geiseln! Die Hunde wollen sich an ihnen rächen!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_001_004<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_001_004<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_001_005<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_001_005<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_001_006<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_001_006<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_002_002<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_002_002<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HOSTAGE01_BATTLETALK_002_003<tab>You must hurry! The others were taken elsewhere by Ser Simeonard.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HOSTAGE01_BATTLETALK_002_003<tab>Ein Priester namens Simeonard hat einige von uns ins Innere der Basilika gebracht. Bitte rettet sie!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_002_004<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_002_004<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_002_005<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_002_005<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_002_006<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_002_006<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab>I will hold the entrance and look after this one. Now go!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab>Wir werden die Geiseln befreien!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>Ser Simeonard? So this is indeed the work of the archbishop's former servants...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>Simeonard ist also auch einer der Papstloyalisten ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_003_003<tab>Secure the hostage, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Leave the others to us!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_003_003<tab>Wir nehmen es mit den Rittern auf! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, kümmer du dich um die Geiseln!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_ZAKO_SWORD01_BATTLETALK_003_004<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_ZAKO_SWORD01_BATTLETALK_003_004<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_003_005<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_003_005<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_003_006<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_003_006<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_003_007<tab>On your guard! They've sounded the alarum!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_003_007<tab>Simeonard von der Heiligsten Flamme? Er war doch immer so aufrichtig und strebsam ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_ZAKO_SWORD01_BATTLETALK_003_007<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_ZAKO_SWORD01_BATTLETALK_003_007<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_003_008<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_003_008<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_ZAKO_SWORD01_BATTLETALK_003_009<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_ZAKO_SWORD01_BATTLETALK_003_009<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HOSTAGE02_BATTLETALK_004_001<tab>Th-They took the others somewhere. I... It all happened so quickly...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HOSTAGE02_BATTLETALK_004_001<tab>Gerettet! Aber da sind noch mehr ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_004_002<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_004_002<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_ZAKO_ANY_BATTLETALK_005_001<tab>There they are! Let none escape!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_ZAKO_ANY_BATTLETALK_005_001<tab>Zeigt keine Gnade mit den Häretikern!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_005_002<tab>Keep going! I will hold them here!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_005_002<tab>Sie fallen uns von hinten an! Keine Sorge, ich halte uns den Rücken frei.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_005_003<tab>Not alone you won't! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─stay with Ser Aymeric and Lord Artoirel!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_005_003<tab>Die Knaben übernehme ich. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, befreie du die restlichen Geiseln!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_005_004<tab>This way, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! To the Quire!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_005_004<tab>Geschafft! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Artoirel - mir nach!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_001<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_002<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_002<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_003<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_003<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_006_004<tab>Come, then! Let us see whom the Fury favors!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_006_004<tab>Ich hol mir den Ostiarius! Ihr befreit die Geiseln!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_006_005<tab>Ser Aymeric is still wounded, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! If we do not move quickly, he will surely fall!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_006_005<tab>Der hat Mumm ... Schnell, die Geiseln, dann helfen wir ihm!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_006<tab>O Halone, render unto us Your judgment! Raise up the righteous, and cast down the wicked!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_006<tab>Vor dir hab ich keine Angst, Aymeric! Die Kriegsgöttin Halone führt mein Schwert!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_007<tab>Traitor! Kinslayer! By what sorcery do you yet stand!? Enough! All of you─attack!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_007<tab>Es ist der Großmeister ...! Jetzt nicht schwach werden!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_006_008<tab>I see no others nearby. Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Ser Aymeric needs our help!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_006_008<tab>Sind die Geiseln in Sicherheit? Dann schnell zu Aymeric!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_006_009<tab>Well done! Now let us finish this, ser─before the eyes of gods and men!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_006_009<tab>Gut gemacht. Bringen wir diesen Aufstand nun zu Ende.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_010<tab>Stand fast, my brothers! The Fury is with us!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_010<tab>Halone! Sprich dein Urteil! Wir halten nicht mehr lange durch ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_011<tab>One day...I swear...you will...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_011<tab>Halone, warum hast du uns verlassen?!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_006_012<tab>There must be others nearby, but where!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_006_012<tab>Das wäre geschafft. Jetzt weiter, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_006_013<tab>Ser Aymeric's strength is almost spent, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We must go to his aid at once!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_006_013<tab>Das hat zu lang gedauert. Schnell, weiter!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_007_001<tab>Have no fear, child. We will save your friend!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_007_001<tab>Mach dir keine Sorgen, Kleiner. Wir holen deine Freundin da raus.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HOSTAGE03_BATTLETALK_007_002<tab>You must hurry! The priest took Maelie upstairs when he saw you kill his men!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HOSTAGE03_BATTLETALK_007_002<tab>Der böse Priester hat meine Freundin Maelie mitgenommen ... Buhuhuhu ...!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>Damn it all...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>Nein ... Nicht jetzt ... Ich habe noch so viel zu ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>A knight lives to serve...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>Haurchefant, mein Bruder ... Ich komme ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_HOSTAGE_DEAD<tab>No, NO! The hostages, they... O Halone, pray forgive me...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_HOSTAGE_DEAD<tab>Verflucht, die Geisel ... Ich habe versagt.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_HOSTAGE_DEAD<tab>Fury take me, they murdered them! And we allowed it to happen...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_HOSTAGE_DEAD<tab>Halone, sei mir gnädig, schon wieder eine Geisel!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_URIANGER_000_110<tab>...This is thy proof? <var 1A 02 /var>The Gerun Oracles<var 1A 01 /var>? Apocrypha.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_URIANGER_000_110<tab>„Geruns Offenbarungen“ ... Hier soll also die wahre Geschichte der Erschaffung der Welt niedergeschrieben sein?

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ELIDIBUSEORZEA_000_111<tab>(-???-)It is a truth long forgotten─a tale of the beginning, and of the path we have been set upon.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ELIDIBUSEORZEA_000_111<tab>(-???-)So ist es. Fügt sich nun das Bild vom Schicksal des Planeten ... und der wahren Gestalt, die er dereinst erlangen muss?

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ELIDIBUSEORZEA_000_112<tab>(-Elidibus-)Our fates were ordained long ago, Archon. The Garleans are no exception. Nor the Triad. You know what must be done.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ELIDIBUSEORZEA_000_112<tab>(-Elidibus-)Die Götter, die man die Triade nennt und deren Kraft die Garlear wie besessen nachjagen ... Nicht einmal wer diese Kraft besitzt, könnte dieses Schicksal verändern.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_PAPALYMO_000_120<tab>...Well?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_PAPALYMO_000_120<tab>Was hat er gesagt?

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YDA_000_121<tab>Everyone has their orders.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YDA_000_121<tab>Dass der Brief seinen Empfänger erreicht hat.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YDA_000_122<tab>The Masks will attack as soon as all units are in position. The imperials won't know what hit them.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YDA_000_122<tab>Und dass die Eisenmasken ausrücken. Es wird zu einem Konflikt mit den Garlearn kommen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_PAPALYMO_000_123<tab>I fear it will be bloody...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_PAPALYMO_000_123<tab>Dann sollten wir uns auf einen langen Kampf einrichten.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YDA_000_124<tab>By Rhalgr, it had better be.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YDA_000_124<tab>Es wurde ja auch Zeit! Meine Fäuste sind schon ganz weich geworden.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_PAPALYMO_000_125<tab>We cannot stay here forever, Yda. We have other responsibilities.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_PAPALYMO_000_125<tab>Yda, dein Kampfgeist in Ehren, aber denk daran: Unsere Freunde warten auf uns. Wir werden gebraucht.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YDA_000_126<tab>I know full well what my responsibilities are─and I mean to fulfill them, every one!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YDA_000_126<tab>Das weiß ich doch. Aber vorher haben wir noch eine Rechnung zu begleichen.
